rules_text:
Choose one – 
• [i]Sylvanus’s Faithful [/i]– Wild creatures you control get [+]1/[+]1 until end of turn. You gain one life for each wild creature you control. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
• [i]Shadow Druid Treachery [/i]– Wound each wild creature you don’t control. Each wounded creature deals 1 damage to its controller.
